recipesJson.name: Pound cake v1
recipesJson.author: jpsublime921
recipesJson.description: Got a bottle of Milk by The Pound and damn is it tasty. Wanted to try my hand at a pound cake. For first attempt its not bad, needs a little more cake flavor i believe. Let me know what you think. Inspired by Milk by The Pound

reviews.text: I made this without the frosting, so take the rating with a grain of salt.  What I got without it was a very creamy, very authentic pound cake that I would have eaten way too much of if it were sitting on a plate rather than in an rda.
